Sentencas: The effect of novel Co and Ce nanocoatings on oxidation behaviour and chromium volatilization from a commercial Fe-22Cr steel (Sanergy HT) developed for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications is investigated.
Titulo: Oxidation of Co- and Ce-nanocoated FeCr steels: A microstructural investigation

Sentencas: Three different coatings (10 nm Ce, 640 nm Co and 10 nm Ce + 640 nm Co) are studied.
Titulo: Oxidation of Co- and Ce-nanocoated FeCr steels: A microstructural investigation

Sentencas: Uncoated and nanocoated samples are exposed isothermally at 850 C in the air with 3% H2O for 168 h. The detailed microstructure of the different coatings is investigated.
Titulo: Oxidation of Co- and Ce-nanocoated FeCr steels: A microstructural investigation

Sentencas: The surface morphology and microstructure of the oxide scales are characterized by using scanning electron microscopy (SEM), transmission electron microscopy (TEM), scanning transmission electron microscopy (STEM) and energy dispersive X-ray analysis (EDX).
Titulo: Oxidation of Co- and Ce-nanocoated FeCr steels: A microstructural investigation

Sentencas: Cross-section TEM thin foils are prepared by using a combined FIB/SEM (focused ion beam/scanning electron microscope) instrument.
Titulo: Oxidation of Co- and Ce-nanocoated FeCr steels: A microstructural investigation

Sentencas: A 640 nm cobalt coating strongly inhibits Cr volatilization but has only minor effects on oxidation rate.
Titulo: Oxidation of Co- and Ce-nanocoated FeCr steels: A microstructural investigation

Sentencas: In contrast, a 10 nm Ce coating decreases the oxidation rate but has no significant effects on chromium volatilization.
Titulo: Oxidation of Co- and Ce-nanocoated FeCr steels: A microstructural investigation

Sentencas: Combining the two coatings, i.e., applying a 640 nm Co coating on top of the 10 nm Ce, effectively reduces Cr evaporation and slows down the rate of alloy oxidation.
Titulo: Oxidation of Co- and Ce-nanocoated FeCr steels: A microstructural investigation
